subject: Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback
description_text:
Hi goodday Simsonn

I have a question about the
Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback
Is these pedal setup compitable with fanatec dd wheelbase, and how to
connect if it is possible

Kind regards
Marco Stans

conversations.body_text: Hi M S,  Yes, it is compitable
